mil5.1.9:1.2_2: natthi tathāgatassa uttariṁ karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo’ti,
mil5.1.9:1.3_3: natthi tathāgatassa uttariṁ karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo,
mil5.1.9:1.3_4: tena hi ‘temāsaṁ paṭisallīno’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.1.9:1.4_2: sabbaṁ taṁ bodhiyāyeva mūle pariniṭṭhitan’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.1.9:1.5_1: sakaraṇīyasseva paṭisallānaṁ yathā nāma byādhitasseva bhesajjena karaṇīyaṁ hoti, abyādhitassa kiṁ bhesajjena.
mil5.1.9:1.6_0: Chātasseva bhojanena karaṇīyaṁ hoti, achātassa kiṁ bhojanena.
mil5.1.9:1.8_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.1.9:2.1_2: natthi tathāgatassa uttariṁ karaṇīyaṁ, katassa vā paticayo,
mil5.1.9:2.1_3: bhagavā ca temāsaṁ paṭisallīno, paṭisallānaṁ kho, mahārāja, bahuguṇaṁ,
mil5.1.9:2.2_1: puriso rañño santikā laddhavaro paṭiladdhabhogo taṁ sukataguṇamanussaranto aparāparaṁ rañño upaṭṭhānaṁ eti;
mil5.1.9:3.1_1: puriso āturo dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhisakkamupasevitvā sotthimanuppatto taṁ sukataguṇamanussaranto aparāparaṁ bhisakkamupasevati;
mil5.1.9:4.1_1: ye guṇe samanussarantā tathāgatā paṭisallānaṁ sevanti.
mil5.1.9:4.3_1: paṭisallānaṁ paṭisallīyamānaṁ attānaṁ rakkhati, āyuṁ vaḍḍheti, balaṁ deti, vajjaṁ pidahati, ayasamapaneti, yasamupaneti, aratiṁ vinodeti, ratimupadahati, bhayamapaneti, vesārajjaṁ karoti, kosajjamapaneti, vīriyamabhijaneti, rāgamapaneti, dosamapaneti, mohamapaneti, mānaṁ nihanti, vitakkaṁ bhañjati, cittaṁ ekaggaṁ karoti, mānasaṁ snehayati, hāsaṁ janeti, garukaṁ karoti, lābhamuppādayati, namassiyaṁ karoti, pītiṁ pāpeti, pāmojjaṁ karoti,
mil5.1.9:4.3_2: saṅkhārānaṁ sabhāvaṁ dassayati, bhavappaṭisandhiṁ ugghāṭeti, sabbasāmaññaṁ deti.
mil5.1.9:4.4_1: ye guṇe samanussarantā tathāgatā paṭisallānaṁ sevanti.
mil5.1.9:5.1_1: tathāgatā santaṁ sukhaṁ samāpattiratiṁ anubhavitukāmā paṭisallānaṁ sevanti pariyositasaṅkappā.
mil5.1.9:5.6_1: tathāgatā paṭisallānaṁ sevanti na sakaraṇīyatāya, na katassa vā paticayāya,
mil5.1.9:5.6_2: atha kho guṇavisesadassāvitāya tathāgatā paṭisallānaṁ sevantī”ti.
